attributes.action: MPs to pay for own TV licence
attributes.additional_details:
I see no reason why we the people should pay out for MPs TV licence.

MPs only work 133 days a year, this means they don't need a licence that covers them for 365 days.

We are paying them to work not sit and watch TV.

TV licence costs £145.50 and there are 650 members of parliament, this is a total cost to the tax payer of £9457.50p in these times of austerity i think its right the members give up the TV licence expense.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority and not a matter for government
